III. INVESTIGATION
Rule Code & CCI Rule 400.4158 Intervention standards and prohibitions.
Section (1) A child caring institution shall establish and follow written
Description policies and procedures that prohibit the following forms of
intervention:
(a) Any type of physical punishment including, but not
limited to:
(iii)Threats of restraint, seclusion, punishment, or
otherwise suggesting physical or emotional harm to a youth.
1

Violation Potential Rule or Statute Violation
Type
Allegation Staff 1 is threatening to fight youth, invites them off the property to
fight, and uses profanity towards the youth regularly.
Investigation This complaint was transferred to DCWL and assigned on
06/01/2023.
The complainant was anonymous so could not be interviewed.
I interviewed Director at the facility on 06/02/2023. Director reported
Staff 1 has been working at the facility for over 10 years. There are
no incident reports involving Staff 1 threatening youths. Staff 1
recently was promoted to team leader. Since there were no
identified youths in the complaint three random youths were
selected and interviewed. There are no incident reports for the
alleged incidents.
I interviewed Youth A at the facility on 06/02/2023. Youth A is 15
years old and has been at the facility for 8 months. Youth A is
familiar with Staff 1 and denied witnessing or hearing Staff 1
threaten or use profanity with the youths. Youth A expressed no
concerns regarding any staff member.
I interviewed Youth B at the facility on 06/02/2023. Youth B is 16
years old and has been at the facility 6 months. He reported Staff 1
is one of his favorite staff and denied witnessing Staff 1 threaten or
use profanity with any youth. Youth B said all his needs are being
and expressed no concerns regarding staff or the facility.
I interviewed Youth C at the facility on 06/02/2023. Youth C is 15
years old and has been at the facility for one month. Youth C denied
being threatened or witnessing Staff 1 threaten or use profanity with
any youth. Youth C reported feeling safe, all his needs are being
met, and liking all the staff at the facility.
I interviewed Staff 1 at the facility on 06/02/2023. Staff 1 has been
working at the facility for over ten years. She appeared shocked
about the allegations. She denied threatening or using profanity with
the youths. She recently was promoted to team leader and has
never had any issues with the youths or staff. She said she is by the
book and is all about following rules and policy and that staff
sometimes get upset with her, but she cannot understand why
anyone would make up false allegations about her.
I interviewed Staff 2 at the facility on 06/02/2023. Staff 2 is a youth
2

specialist and has been working at the facility for 3 years. He
reported he works with Staff 1 and has never heard Staff 1 threaten
or use profanity with youths. He could not recall any incident or
situation where Staff 1 threaten or used profanity with the youths.
I interviewed Staff 3 at the facility on 06/02/2023. Staff 3 is 1st shift
supervisor and has worked at the facility for 16 years. He reported
Staff 1 has worked at the facility for over 10 years and has never
had anyone complain about her. He said Staff 1 is stern and direct
and is all about following rules. He expressed no concerns
regarding staff 1.
Analysis Based on the interviews there is no evidence that supports
Staff threaten or use profanity with any youth.
Conclusion Violation Not Established
IV. RECOMMENDATION
Based on investigative findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable
licensing statutes and rules. It is recommended that the current license status be
continued.
